import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {AiOutlineMail } from 'react-icons/ai'; import {FaIdBadge} from 'react-icons/fa'; import {FaChild} from 'react-icons/fa'; import {FaItalic} from 'react-icons/fa'; import Barchart from './Barchart'; function Dashboard() { const[users,setUsers]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users") .then((response)=>response.json()) .then((data)=>setUsers(data)) },[]) return (

BASIC DASHBOARD

NAME

10

USERNAME

10

EMAIL

10

ID

10

Records of Users

{users.map((user)=> )}
ID Name Username Email
{user.id} {user.name} {user.username} {user.email}
); } export default Dashboard;
